title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 80.2 - Attorney of record
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 80.2 - Attorney of record

State Regulations

An attorney retained in connection with any proceeding, as defined in section
168
of the

Executive Law, shall be deemed the attorney of record pursuant to the
provisions thereof, provided he shall file the notice of retainer and
appearance, prescribed by the State Liquor Authority, prior to or at the time
of his first appearance in the proceeding. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
80.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
